div.p: The Senior Java Developer will work closely as part of the larger Application Development team with other Application Developers, Data Scientists, Business Analyst and Delivery Managers.

ul.li: Design, build and support applications in traditional and big data environment based on established design patterns and architectural standards.
Work with other developers and Data Science team to implement descriptive analytics model meeting software development standards.
Perform feasibility analysis on potential future projects and presents findings to management.
Over 8+ years of experience in solutioning application architecture

li.strong: Strong in core Java (Collections, Concurrency, etc )
Strong understanding of Object oriented programming
Excellent understanding in data structures and algorithms

ul.li: Understanding of JVM architecture (Java Heap, Garbage Collection, etc.)
Experience with design patterns (Singleton, Factory, Observer, etc.)

li.strong: Strong mathematical background is a plus (differential equations, Linear Algebra, probability, etc.)
Numerical methods (root finding, matrix manipulation, integration, etc.)

ul.li: Able to communicate effectively with data science.
Experience supporting trading desks is a plus.
Comfortable interfacing with a diverse set of people (Quants, Data Scientists, etc.)
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Ability to influence and drive diverse groups of technical and non-technical engineers and executives
Ability to work independently and make objective decisions independently
Excellent troubleshooting and problem solving skills
Ability to work in a matrix managed organization
